name: Emelia
natural_language_description: 这是 Emelia 节点。主要用于: Consume the Emelia API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: campaign | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll

campaignId.name: campaignId
campaignId.description: The ID of the campaign to duplicate. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
campaignId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Campaign Name or ID | 作用: The ID of the campaign to duplicate. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

contactEmail.name: contactEmail
contactEmail.description: The email of the contact to add to the contact list
contactEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact Email | 作用: The email of the contact to add to the contact list | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: customFieldsUi (值: None) - Filter by custom fields
firstName (值: None) - First name of the contact to add
lastContacted (值: None) - Last contacted date of the contact to add
lastName (值: None) - Last name of the contact to add
lastOpen (值: None) - Last opened date of the contact to add
lastReplied (值: None) - Last replied date of the contact to add
mailsSent (值: None) - Number of emails sent to the contact to add
phoneNumber (值: None) - Phone number of the contact to add

campaignName.name: campaignName
campaignName.description: The name of the new campaign to create
campaignName.natural_language_description: 参数名: New Campaign Name | 作用: The name of the new campaign to create | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: copyContacts (值: None) - Whether to copy all the contacts from the original campaign
copyProvider (值: None) - Whether to set the same email provider than the original campaign
copyMails (值: None) - Whether to copy all the steps of the email sequence from the original campaign
copySettings (值: None) - Whether to copy all the general settings from the original campaign

contactListId.name: contactListId
contactListId.description: The ID of the contact list to add the contact to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
contactListId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact List Name or ID | 作用: The ID of the contact list to add the contact to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)
